title: "Machine learning uncovers hidden diabetic cases among those with normal fasting glucose"
excerpt: "Undiagnosed cases burden the healthcare system, prompting an emphasis on early diagnosis and a turn to machine learning for efficient screening. Despite its proven accuracy in risk prediction, relying solely on fasting blood glucose can overlook many cases."
